name: Lunar Jailbreak
overview: A sort of sci-fi version of Keystone Kapers. Has menu options of music/sound effects and multicolour/black-and-white graphics modes. Even a subgame included in which you can win a jetpack for extra speed. You can't lose any energy or lives but If the prisoner gets to the airlock then it's game over. Published in Commodore Format 1993/11 (Issue #38).
